definition: shrike
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
one hundred (old)
variant of 霸[ba4]
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
shrike (family Laniidae)
(bird species of China) southern grey shrike (Lanius meridionalis)
(bird species of China) Burmese shrike (Lanius collurioides)
(bird species of China) red-tailed shrike (Lanius phoenicuroides)
(bird species of China) long-tailed shrike (Lanius schach)
(bird species of China) Chinese grey shrike (Lanius sphenocercus)
(bird species of China) great grey shrike (Lanius excubitor)
(bird species of China) grey-backed shrike (Lanius tephronotus)
(bird species of China) bull-headed shrike (Lanius bucephalus)
(bird species of China) brown shrike (Lanius cristatus)
(bird species of China) red-backed shrike (Lanius collurio)
(bird species of China) steppe grey shrike (Lanius pallidirostris)
(bird species of China) isabelline shrike (Lanius isabellinus)
(bird species of China) tiger shrike (Lanius tigrinus)
(bird species of China) lesser grey shrike (Lanius minor)

sentences.english: Shrike says that art is the answer, as art is distilled from suffering.
sentences.chinese: 伯勞說，藝術是解決問題的答案，藝術是源自痛苦。

sentences.english: Any of various birds, especially the shrike, that impale their prey on thorns.
sentences.chinese: 伯勞一種鳥類，尤指伯勞，將其捕獲物刺穿在樹刺上。

sentences.english: Any of various birds, especially the shrike, that impale their prey on thorns.
sentences.chinese: 伯勞一種鳥類，尤指伯勞，將其捕獲物刺穿在樹刺上。

sentences.english: His only option for such release besides Betty is Mary Shrike.
sentences.chinese: 他的唯一選擇，例如釋放除了貝蒂是瑪麗伯勞鳥。

sentences.english: Mary will kiss him because she hates Shrike, but will not sleep with him.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗會吻他，因爲她恨伯勞鳥，但不會同他睡覺。

sentences.english: He does, and Shrike leaves the apartment.
sentences.chinese: 他這樣做，和伯勞鳥離開公寓。
